alert.note: Alert for Cotton (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 04 at 8:33AM CDT until June 04 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Deep Red Creek near Randlett affecting Cotton County.
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. OKC033-050145- /O.EXT.KOUN.FL.W.0007.000000T0000Z-220605T0200Z/ /RNDO2.1.ER.220603T0645Z.220603T2330Z.220604T2000Z.NO/ 833 AM CDT Sat Jun 4 2022 ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Deep Red Creek near Randlett. * WHEN...Until late this evening. * IMPACTS...At 21.0 feet, Flood depths up to 1 foot occur over croplands... pastures... and low-lying local roads along and near the creek. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 21.2 feet. - Forecast...The Deep Red Creek is expected to fall below flood stage late this afternoon and continue falling. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
